heisigStory: The special craft of successful taskmasters is their ability to remain constantly on the aggressive, never allowing their underlings a moment to ponder a counter-aggression of their own.
koohiiStory1: Aggression is the craft of a good dominatrix.
koohiiStory2: AGGRESSION is a well-honed craft for any decent taskmaster.
myStory: tấn công. dùng vật dụng để đánh.
